task.title: Task: Export to Word
task.shortdesc: How to export an Access table to a new RTF document.

taskbody.context: When you want to place the contents of a table or the result of a query into an existing Word document, then copy and paste is the simplest method. But you can also export the data to a new Word document. Then a document will be created in RTF format (Rich Text Format) that ca be opened in Word.

step.cmd: Right-click on the table name and choose Export Word RTF File .
step.stepresult: The dialog box Export - RTF Tile is displayed.

step.cmd: Specify file name and path, then click OK.
step.stepresult: The dialog box Save Export Steps is displayed.

step.cmd: It's not necessary to save the export steps. Click Close.
Check the export by opening the file in Word.
